A must have for any Steam user. Truly a great and very fun game, with the leveling of each character, loads of different guns, skins, mods, maps, fun multiplayer, and multiple achievments, the $20 (or $10-5) will very well be worth it.

Even though its a few years old - Tripwire still cares about this game, they respond to the community and are STILL adding new content.  I only started playing during Holloween but this game is spot on if your looking for a zombie survival game.  A lot of fun to be had but beware any difficulty above hard. If you dont rank up your classes first - you're in for a nightmare.

Q.一番強いPerkは？ 

Firebug

Q.この炎の紋章はなんですか？ 

焔の神-God of Flame-の守護を受けし選ばれし者だけが使える最強の能力を表す 
聖なる炎、エターナル・イノセント・フレイムで敵を焼き尽くし通った跡には大体何も残らない 
しかし強力すぎる能力のため、素人が使うと自身だけでなく他人をも巻き込んでWiped outする可能性がある

One of the best games on steam, this game never gets old its always a good time to hop on with a group of pals and slaughter tons of zeds, in my opinion its better than L4D2 as in there isnt that insetive to stay with your mates in order to survive although it will help drasticly. By far the one game I can laugh about losing in, which is why I enjoy playing this with others. Besides that, its a pretty simple goal, survive. No real story, no cutscences (besides the cinematic entry of the Patriarch), and no maincharacters to add to the game which kinda lets you focus on the fun more than story. Overall, I suck at reviews but I enjoy watching random creatures of the season get brutally put down in a gut-bust expedition of survival and horror.

The last time i played, the engine was really good, however the AI was trash, and the are so few weapons.

not very many lvls, and not a lot going on with the game. it was extremely naked, but again, the FPS portion of the game was very enjoyable.

if they unfuck the AI, make the graphics better, increase the dynamics, give game objects, add like 50 more weapons, bombs traps, they'd have somethign sick.

Also, charactor progression, gear, constructable environment would turn this from a 10.00 game to a 60.00 game.

but until then, it's a cheap thrill, not amazing.

Killing floor is a survival horror game, one of the best I have played. If your looking for a zombie survival game with a storyline, perhaps Killing Floor isnt for you, this game is about just, surviving. You can play online with your friends, which in my opinion is actually more fun then playing alone. This game has a wide variety of weapons, and since this includes the DLC you have even more!. It also includes perks, and other upgrades to help you through this game. This game is more focused about multiplayer and teamwork, I like it, you should get it and play it now!
Spiel is recht nett mit Freunden blos die ganzen Mikrotransaktionen kotzen an!
Awesome gunplay, beautiful maps (even if the engine is at its age) and alot to achieve.  It really shines when playing with friends or just with a group of players. Go nuts, it's worthy of your DOSH!
